# Huutopussi Score Tracker

This is a Next.js Progressive Web App for tracking scores in Huutopussi matches.

## Project Features
- Mobile-optimized compact screen design
- Progressive Web App (PWA) for offline use
- Score tracking for Huutopussi card game
- Downloadable app for mobile devices

## Development Notes
- Built with Next.js for optimal performance
- Uses PWA service workers for offline functionality
- Responsive design optimized for mobile screens
- TypeScript for type safety
